prompts: Create a powerful ice-type Pokemon with large tusks and a furry body.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a woolly mammoth, standing strong in icy terrains.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that has a round body, white tusks, and a blue mask.
Make a Pokemon with a thick brown coat and bright blue eyes for an icy battle.
Imagine a stout and furry Pokemon with distinctive features inspired by prehistoric creatures.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in snowy habitats and showcases unique tusk-like features.
Show me a Pokemon that combines characteristics of a mammoth with playful, friendly traits.
